message: Winning isn't everything; it's the only thing.
author: Vince Lombardi

message: The only way to prove you are a good sport is to lose.
author: Ernie Banks

message: I’ve missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I’ve succeeded.
author: Michael Jordan

message: It's not whether you get knocked down; it's whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

message: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

message: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

message: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
author: Pelé

message: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.
author: Pele

message: What you lack in talent can be made up with desire, hustle, and giving 110% all the time.
author: Don Zimmer

message: Do you want to know who you are? Don’t ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
author: Thomas Jefferson
